text: Carlos Maria Alfonso Marcelo de Borbón-Dos Sicilias y de Borbón-Parma, Infante of Spain, Duke of Calabria (16 January 1938 – 5 October 2015) was, at his death, the last infante of Spain during the reigns of his cousins King Juan Carlos I and King Felipe VI. Additionally, he was also one of two claimants to the headship of the dynasty which ruled the Kingdom of the Two Sicilies before to its incorporation into the Kingdom of Italy in 1861, in which capacity he was also the Grand Master of one of the three branches of the Sacred Military Constantinian Order of Saint George. == References == Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Knights of the Golden Fleece Category:Spanish House of Bourbon Category:Spanish infantes and infantas Category:Recipients of the Order of the Aztec Eagle Category:People from Lausanne Category:Spanish Roman Catholics
title: Infante Carlos, Duke of Calabria
